# Government Tender Announcement: HVAC Maintenance Services in Iqaluit, Nunavut
## Job Title: Request for Proposal (RFP) for HVAC Maintenance Services
### Reference Number: cb-977-19569346
### Solicitation Number: 1000256252-001
### Tender Closing Date: June 25, 2024, at 2:00 PM (14:00:00)

## Background
The Department of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) requires a reliable and experienced provider to deliver Heating, Ventilation, Air Conditioning (HVAC) maintenance and building patrol services in Iqaluit, Nunavut.

## Objective
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open only to Inuit firms registered on the Inuit Firm Registry. The proposed contract period will last from the contract award date to June 30, 2025. The resulting contract may include optional extensions of up to 3 additional one-year periods, subject to the same conditions.

## Description of Work
The Department of CIRNAC requires a comprehensive service to maintain and repair the HVAC systems in Iqaluit, Nunavut. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing:

* Regular maintenance and repair of the HVAC systems
* Building patrols to ensure the systems are functioning properly
* Security clearance: High reliability is required

## Evaluation Criteria
The proposals will be evaluated based on:

* Technical merit (40%)
* Price (40%)
* Past performance (20%)

## Requirements
The following requirements must be met for the contract to be awarded:

* Inuit Firm Registry registration
* Security clearance: High reliability
* Compliance with Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (Nunavut)
* Proof of business experience and qualifications
* Compliance with the applicable laws and regulations

## Contacts
For any inquiries or clarification, please contact Elly Ha at (000) 000-0000 or ellyhyeonkyeong.ha@sac-isc.gc.ca.

## Tender Package
The tender package is available on the Canadabuy site. Interested vendors can access the package and submit their proposals by the deadline.

**End of Tender Announcement**
